knimeNode.name: Spectra Writer
knimeNode.shortDescription: Writes a spectra column out to disk for processing with other Mass Spec. software. Supports MGF format but does not guarantee that all input data will be preserved in the created file.

fullDescription.intro:
This node takes data previously loaded by the Spectra Reader and saves it to disk in the specified format. It will "fake" data which required by the file format but is not loaded into KNIME:
WARNING: this node does not guarantee to preserve all data present in the loaded files as the software is incomplete and imperfect. Use this node at own risk.
